str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A multitude, crowd, great number, assemblage. From pletho; a fulness, i.e. A large number, throng, populace.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
And, even, also, namely.
From psucho; breath, i.e. spirit, abstractly or concretely.
Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: To begin, am, exist, be in possession. From hupo and archomai; to begin under, i.e. Come into existence; expletively, to exist (verb).
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
